document.full_text: patrick marleau got his first point of the series when he knocked home a rebound with 7:47 to play, and san jose finally managed to knock out detroit on its fourth try.
document.title: sharks 3, red wings 2 : marleau makes amends as sharks advance on fourth try
lines_and_colors: patrick marleau got his first point of the series when he knocked home a rebound with 7:47 to play, and san jose finally managed to knock out detroit on its fourth try.
